title: scipy computation of digamma at the poles changed, leading to test failure
body_html:
[pytorch]
Scipy 1.1.0 computes digamma at [0, -2, -239] poles as [-inf, nan, nan] (there actually were documented changes to scipy digamma computation in this version), Scipy 1.0.1 and below used to compute them as [inf, inf, inf], torch computes them as [inf, inf, inf]. Thus, tests on the systems with scipy 1.1.0 fail. Neither computation is wrong, function is undefined at the poles, so perhaps testing strategy should be rethought.
